text: Jessica Michelle Chastain (born March 17, 1986) is an American actress. She is ranked as one of the Time 100 most influential people in 2012. ==Filmography== *Dark Shadows (2004) - Carolyn Stoddard Television series *Blackbeard (2006) - Charlotte Ormand Television series *Jolene (2008) - Jolene *Stolen (2009) - Sally Ann *Murder on the Orient Express (2010) - Mary Debenham Television series *The Debt (2010) - Rachel Singer (young) *Take Shelter (2011) - Samantha LaForche *Coriolanus (2011) - Virgilia *The Tree of Life (2011) - Mrs. O'Brien *The Help (2011) - Celia Foote *Wilde Salome (2011) - Salome *Texas Killing Fields (2011) - Pam Stall *Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted (2012) - Voice of Gia *Lawless (2012) - Maggie *Tar (2012) - Mrs. Williams *Zero Dark Thirty (2012) - Maya *Mama (2013) - Annabel *Interstellar (2014) - Murphy Cooper *It â€“ Chapter Two (2019) - Adult Beverly Marsh ==Personal life== Chastain married Gian Luca Passi de Preposulo in 2017. They have a daughter. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Sacramento, California Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Best Actress Academy Award winners Category:Golden Globe Award winners Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:Satellite Award winners Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors
title: Jessica Chastain
